title: ASICS Privacy Policy
intro: We value the trust that you place in us by sharing your personal data with us. ASICS takes your privacy seriously and is committed to handling your personal data in a way that is fair and worthy of that trust. ASICS will take all reasonable steps to protect your data from misuse and keep it secure. We believe it is important to inform you about how we will use your personal data. Therefore, we encourage you to read this privacy policy carefully. To view the full privacy policy, click here.

successor_links.text: We may de-identify your personal data.
Your personal data will be shared between the responsible ASICS companies that may use your personal data as described in this Privacy Policy.

Sometimes ASICS offers you a service or application in co-operation with partners. We may also disclose your personal data to those partners, but only where you have consented or requested that we do so.
We may also disclose data about you, including personal data to any other third parties, where you have consented or requested that we do so.
We may generate aggregated statistics about the users of our products and Services.
We use cookies, clear GIFs/pixel tags, JavaScript, local storage, log files, and other mechanisms to automatically collect and record data about your browsing activities, and use of the Services.

Our third party providers use cookies, clear GIFs/pixel tags, JavaScript, local storage, log files, and other mechanisms to automatically collect and record data about your browsing activities, and use of the Services.

nodes.label: All Data ASICS Collects about You
nodes.text: All of your data that ASICS collects. This is made up of many different kinds of data, which are shown in other circles in the diagram that are connected to this circle.

successor_links.text: We may share aggregate or de-identified data with third parties for research, marketing, analytics and other purposes, provided such data does not identify a particular individual.

nodes.label: Anonymized Data about You
nodes.text: De-identified data about you.

nodes.text: De-identified data about you.

nodes.label: All Data ASICS Collects about You
nodes.data_handler: Data controllers within the ASICS Group

nodes.label: All Data ASICS Collects about You
nodes.text: Data ASICS may share with third-party service providers. Our contracts with these service providers do not permit use of your data for their own (marketing) purposes. Consistent with applicable legal requirements, we take commercially reasonable steps to require third parties to adequately safeguard your personal data and only process it in accordance with our instructions.

nodes.opts_text: We will only disclose your personal data to partners where you have consented or requested that we do so.
nodes.label: All Data ASICS Collects about You
nodes.text: Data where you have consented or requested that we share with partners.

nodes.label: All Data ASICS Collects about You
nodes.data_handler: Third parties in case of legal requirement
nodes.text: Personal data we are required by law to disclose.

nodes.label: All Data ASICS Collects about You
nodes.text: Personal data we disclose as part of any merger, sale, transfer of ASICSâ€™s assets, acquisition, bankruptcy, or similar event.

nodes.opts_text: We will only disclose this data where you have consented or requested that we do so.
nodes.label: All Data ASICS Collects about You
nodes.text: Data where you have consented or requested that we share.

successor_links.text: We may share aggregate or de-identified data with third parties for research, marketing, analytics and other purposes, provided such data does not identify a particular individual.

nodes.label: Aggregated Statistics about Users
nodes.text: Aggregated statistics about the users of our products and Services.

nodes.label: Data Aggregated from Multiple People
nodes.text: Aggregated statistics about the users of our products and Services.

nodes.label: Contact Details
nodes.text: Your name, postal address and other contact details, such as your telephone number and e-mail address.

nodes.label: Account Data and Electronic Identification Data
nodes.text: Your ASICS ID account or other ASICS account (if you have made such an account with us) and other electronic identification data (such as IDFA, GAID, IP address, MAC address) and the data you add to your ASICS ID account or other ASICS account, such as your password, your date of birth, your gender, your language of preference, the time zone you live in, your picture and other data you may share with us.

nodes.label: Data Regarding Your Use of Our Online Services
nodes.text: This may include data regarding the pages you visit, the products and services you like and the content of your abandoned shopping cart.

nodes.label: Your Purchases in Our Stores and Online
nodes.text: The data we collect if you purchase a product or use a Service in one of our stores or online, such as the amount and date of your purchase, the product you purchase or Service you use, location of the store, the website or app through which you make your purchase, payment method, payment status, discount, delivery method and delivery address.

nodes.label: Your Leisure Activities, Interest and Events
nodes.text: This includes data regarding events we organize or sponsor, including your interest in and registration to those events (including the date and place of the event and your personal targets), as well as your reason for running and other fitness activities, whether you prefer to run alone or with friends and what other sports you enjoy.

nodes.label: Your Training and Running Data
nodes.text: The training and running data that you fill out on or generate through the use of our Services or that you import from other apps or services from our partners or third parties, including your running experience and current running abilities (the distance you can run and the time that you can run it in), your training goal (aimed distance and race time), performance (distance and race time, records), training schedule (date, duration and type), your type of running (trail running, natural running or speed running) and your fitness activities.

nodes.label: Your Details Regarding Contests
nodes.text: The data we collect if you participate in a contest.

nodes.label: Your Reviews
nodes.text: The opinions, experiences, preferences and interests, and product or event reviews that you publish on our websites or share with us online or through social media, such as your experiences and tips regarding gear, your race day and your training schedule.

nodes.label: Your Communication Data
nodes.text: Your requests, any complaints you may have and any other data that we receive if we communicate with you via e-mail, online or via social media.

nodes.opts_text: We will only use health data you voluntarily provide us and such only with your prior consent or under your direction to do so and only for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. You may refuse or revoke your consent at any time, as set out below (see â€˜Your Rightsâ€™).
nodes.label: Activity Data and Self-Reported Data
nodes.text: Your foot and clothes size and other personal measurement data and activity data that you voluntarily share with us through the use of the Services, such as weight, height, heartrate, calories burned, steps taken, nutritional data, sleep activities, other activity data (type, duration and frequency of fitness activities, distance, speed, pace, step count) and injuries.

nodes.opts_text: We will only use health data you voluntarily provide us and such only with your prior consent or under your direction to do so and only for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. You may refuse or revoke your consent at any time, as set out below (see â€˜Your Rightsâ€™).
nodes.label: Your Running Specifics
nodes.text: Your current running shoe, which running type you are and the level of your running.

nodes.opts_text: We will only use health data you voluntarily provide us and such only with your prior consent or under your direction to do so and only for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. You may refuse or revoke your consent at any time, as set out below (see â€˜Your Rightsâ€™).
nodes.label: Your Test and Measurement Results
nodes.text: Measurement data we collect if you participate in one of our tests or measurement programs, such as Foot ID, Motion ID, Running Lab, 3D foot shape measurement, leg alignment measurement, body composition measurement, leg strength test, running form test, aerobic test and similar measurement programs and tests. Measurement data that we collect during our tests may also include heartrate, blood pressure, oxygen level in blood, fat and muscle mass weight and percentage, BMI, BMR, strength and endurance.

nodes.opts_text: We will only use location data you voluntarily provide us and such only with your prior consent or under your direction to do so and only for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. You may refuse or revoke your consent at any time, as set out below (see â€˜Your Rightsâ€™).
nodes.label: Your Location
nodes.text: Exact data regarding your location, such as GPS, accelerometer, your running route (including precise location data that shows your geographical position).

nodes.label: Your Browsing Activities and Use of the Services
nodes.text: Data collected using cookies, log files, and more.

nodes.label: Your Browsing Activities and Use of the Services
nodes.text: Data collected using cookies, log files, and more.
